Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
BrowseVersesDelegate
BrowseVersesModelThis class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a tree view that is used to browse the verses of multiple translations
CommandPerformSearchThis class represents a command that searches the translations for a given string
ICommandThis class represents a generic command interface
ISearchResultsThis class represents an interface for accumulating translation search results
SearchResultsModelThis class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a table view which displays the results of a search
SearchResultsSerialThis class implements the ISearchResults interface using a serial linear search
StarredVersesModelThis class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a list view which represents the verses the user has starred
BibleStudy::StaticDescriptorInitializer_TranslationBuffer_2eproto
TranslationThis class represents a specific translation of the Bible
BibleStudy::TranslationBuffer
TranslationManagerThis class represents a collection of read-only translations
TranslationNotFoundThis class represents an exception that is thrown when a Translation object of the given name is not found in the TranslationManager
UIBibleStudyWidgetThis class is the GUI respresentation of the top level widget for the application
UIBrowseVersesWidgetThis class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a tree view that allows the user to browse the verses of all Translation objects
UISearchResultsWidgetThis class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a table view which displays the results of a text search
UISearchWidgetThis class represents a collection of widgets which provide a text input field to input a search string and a button to start the search
UIStarredVersesWidgetThis class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a list view which represents the verses the user has starred
UITextViewWidgetThis class respresents a text box that displays a collection of verses and allows the user to star, unstar a verse and navigate a translation
VerseThis class represents a single verse in a Translation object
BibleStudy::VerseBuffer
VerseDisplayThis class respresents the information necessary to display a given verse. This include the verse ID, the number of context verses, and Translation object
VerseTreeItemThis class is used to represent a verse and its relationship to other verses in a Translation object that allow it to be displayed in a tree view
